EmailTemplate.name: NUR-2021FY-LEAD-GEN-FOLLOW-UP-PROGRAM.Nancy - 2A
EmailTemplate.subject: Teladoc Health: Virtual Healthcare Strategy
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Hello}},
We appreciate your interest in Teladoc Health! Just a follow-up to see if you would like further insight into how our virtual health solution delivers the technology, access, quality, and breadth of care that set us apart. Including a few facts below and direct scheduling options if you have 15 minutes for a brief introductory call: https://calendly.com/nancy-sale-teladoc/discovery-call?utm_campaign=atmd-lead-outreach&utm_medium=email&utm_source=marketo&utm_content=email-2a
Teladoc Health virtual care solution gives members: • 24/7 access to board-certified doctors on-demand by phone or video • General medical, primary, acute, complex, chronic and mental healthcare • Diagnoses, treatment and prescribed medication if necessary • A new, more cost-effective front door to the healthcare system to feel better faster • 4x greater utilization over industry average
Looking forward to your reply.
Warmly, Nancy
Nancy Sale, BSN, RN Product Awareness Specialist Teladoc Health, Inc.
nancy.sale@teladochealth.com
Livongo is now part of Teladoc Health, the global leader in virtual care.
